New Records: New Orleans Pelicans secured a road victory against the Washington Wizards on January 5, 2025.
The Pelicans made 18 three-pointers in consecutive games for the first time this season.
CJ McCollum scored 25 points, contributing to the balanced offensive attack.
Key Match Events: The Pelicans held a 15-point halftime lead.
Trey Murphy III suffered an injury during the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Willie Green highlighted the defensive performance and the team's ability to get offensive rebounds and transition points.
The victory marked the Pelicans' second road win of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Forward Trey Murphy III was injured with an ankle sprain and was ruled out for the rest of the game.
